text: The Centre de services scolaire des Hautes-Rivières is a francophone school service centre in the Canadian province of Quebec. It comprises several primary schools and high schools across municipalities in the Montérégie region. The commission was overseen by a board of elected school trustees. ==References== == External links == * Website * Facebook Category:Historical school districts in Quebec Category:Education in Montérégie
title: Centre de services scolaire des Hautes-Rivières
